content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt, it seems we're focusing on the rental price only per the given context rules. With that in mind, let's begin negotiations. I originally had high expectations for this prime location in Magdeburg's city center, so my initial thought is 1500 Euros per month. Haoyu, what rental price do you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for me. I was thinking more around 900 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my aim is to secure the highest price possible for this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
